name: Cadwen 'Mor o Gariad'
description:
Dwi wedi gwneud 7 gadwen sbesial yma, sy'n darllen 'Mor o gariad' a blodau bach ar y tu ol- dim ond saith ar gael - i bobl arbennig dolig yma!

Mae'r gadwen gylch yn mesur 24mm mewn diameter mewn enamel glas golau a glas tywyll.

Mae'r cadwini yma yn dod gyda cadwen arian 45cm yn unig.

Archebwch cyn 18fed o Rhagfur i'w gael cyn y Nadolig! Ond peidiwch aros rhy hwyr neu fydda nhw di mynd!

/////////

I've only made 7 of these special necklaces that reads 'Mor o gariad' - that translates a 'Sea of Love'.

all of the 7 necklaces come on a 45cm length chain 

Remember you need to order by the 18th of December to receive before Christmas, but i wouldn't wait to long or they will be gone!

name: Navy Christmas Angel Illustrated Wrapping paper
description:
A illustrated Christmas wrapping paper. Delicately drawn angels dancing in the mid-night sky.

Every sheet is A1 in size and printed digitally on recycled paper. Every set has 6 sheets.

Each individual/set comes folded into A4, and wrapped with special gold ribbon and angel gift tags.

name: Cardyn Bathodyn glas tywyll 'Nadolig Llawen' Badge Card in navy
description:
Cardyn Nadolig gyda bathodyn yn darllen 'Nadolig Llawen' wedi ei printio mewn lliw glas tywyll. Mae'r bathodyn yn dod ar gardyn brown sydd wedi ei brintio mewn aur gyda calon ar tu blaen. Mae'r cardyn yn dod gyda amlen brown.

This navy badge reads 'Nadolg llawen' which is 'Merry Christmas' in welsh. The badge is attached to a gold printed heart card and tied to a brown envelope with string.

options.name: pecyn o 4 - i gyd yn gymraeg

name: Navy Merry Christmas badge
description:
Gold printed heart cards with a navy badge card with a 'Merry Christmas' message printed with illustrated stars.

The card is printed on re-cycled paper and is blank inside. The card come with a brown envelope which is also made out of re-cycled paper and is tied with string.

name: Cardyn Bathodyn 'Nadolig Llawen' Badge Card
description:
Cardyn Nadolig gyda bathodyn yn darllen 'Nadolig Llawen'. Mae'r bathodyn yn dod ar gardyn plaen brown neu gwyn ag amlen 

This badge reads 'Nadolg llawen' which is 'Merry Christmas' in welsh. The badge is attached on a brown/ off-white card and tied to a brown envelope with string.

options.name: pecyn o 4 - Cymraeg (cardyn brown i gyd)
pecyn o 4 - Cymraeg (cardyn gwyn i gyd)

name: Merry Christmas Holly Badge Card
description:
Hand written 'Merry Christmas' greeting badge attached to a brown or off-white re-cycled card. The card is blank inside free for your own greeting. The card is wrapped together with a kraft recycled enveloped and tied with string.

Perfect card for any ages for Christmas!

name: Christmas Gift Tags
description:
Decorate you christmas presents with these lovely gift tags, printed on recycled paper with twine string. 

The greeting on the gift tags reads 
'We wish you a merry Christmas,
We wish you a merry Christmas
And a happy new year'

name: Tagiau parseli Nadolig /// Christmas gift tags
description: Decorate you christmas presents with these lovely gift tags, printed on recycled paper with twine string. The greeting on the gift tags reads 'Nadolig Llawen a Blwyddyn Newydd Dda' which is 'Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year' in Welsh!

name: Illustrated Christmas Wrapping paper
description:
A illustrated Christmas wrapping paper. Delicately drawn animals and figures - deers, rabbits, squirrels, little people on horses and angels hop around the holly and stars.

Every sheet is A1 in size and printed digitally on recycled paper. ^ sheets in a pack.

Each set comes folded into A4, and wrapped with twine string and comes with 6 special printed Christmas tags.

name: Hand printed Pins&Needle case greeting card
description:
This sweet little hand printed Pins&Needle case is the perfect card for any sewing enthusiast..or as a little present.

Printed by hand by me Jessie on a lovely thick card and tied with a rag bow to the spine.

Inside there is a little folded patch of vintage wool blanket with a selection of both pins and needled in.

There is then blank space to write your own greeting.

This item comes hand tied with a rough brown hand printed envelope ready to go in the post....

name: Workshop day gift voucher
description:
A hand tied workshop gift Voucher that comes in a hand printed enveloped.

The voucher contains a little paper needle case as a gift for the person receving the voucher.

There is blank space inside the card for you to write your own message when this is given as a gift.

This voucher is for a one day 6 hour workshop with me Jessie Chorley at my shop at 158 a Columbia Rd.

You will have expert one on one tuition while being surrounded by all the interesting and hand made things in our shop.

Tea coffee and cakes will be served on the day.

"I traveled from my home in LA in October 2013 to spend a wonderful and inspiring day with Jessie in her shop. It was a dream come true for me as I have always wanted to know how she makes here altered Books. I left with three Journals that I am so pleased all made by myself with Jessie's help and expert advice on the day. This was a birthday gift never to be forgotten that I can thank my dearest sister for" Tilly Cambridge.

The price of this voucher contains a materials pack for the day worth £20.00

Once the voucher has been given as a gift the Reciever must contact me directly to arrange a date for the chosen workshop to go ahead and to confirm which type of workshop they would like to take from the below list. This information is printed inside the voucher.

*Embroidered Memory books and Pages
*Embroidered Objects
*Altered Objects and Journals

Please note more info on my workshop types and images of the type of thing that will be made can be viewed at my workshops home page

www.jessiechorleyworkshops.bigcartel.com

options.name: Workshop day gift voucher x 1 person £125.00
Workshop day gift Voucher x 2 people
Workshop day gift voucher x 3 people
Workshop day gift voucher x 4 people

name: Pack of 6 hand printed Christmas cards
10 Hand printed rough brown Christmas tags
10 Hand printed rough brown gift tags

description: Product info coming shortly

name: Hand printed christmas wrapping paper x 6 sheets
description:
This pack of six sheets of christmas wrapping paper is hand printed by Jessie.

Each piece of paper is hand printed using Jessie's own designed runner block stamps.

The paper is rough Buff grey color sugar paper in large a1 sheets 177/155mm

Perfect for wrapping large gifts or for cutting and making tags,and decorations of your own.

name: Hand tied christmas wrapping paper x 6 sheets
The Great day greeting card
description:
This card is digitally printed and comes with a cream hand printed envelope.

The image on the card is a detail from one of Jessie's embroidered works titled The great day.

This card is blank inside for your own message and measures 6inch/6inch.

name: The letter printed greeting card
description:
This card is digitally printed and comes with a cream hand printed envelope.

The image on the card is a detail from one of Jessie's embroidered works titled The Letter.

This card is blank inside for your own message and measures 6inch/6inch.

name: Roll up Roll Up Printed greeting card
description:
This card is digitally printed and comes with a cream hand printed envelope.

The image on the card is a detail from one of Jessie's embroidered works titled Roll up Roll up.

This card is blank inside for your own message.

name: Le Voyage printed greeting card
description:
This card is digitally printed and comes with a cream hand printed envelope.

The image on the card is a detail from one of Jessie's embroidered works titled Le Voyage.

This card is blank inside for your own message and measures 6inch/6inch.

name: Hand tied assorted post card pack
description:
Hand tied pack of six assorted postcards

Each postcard comes with its own hand printed pale ivory envelope with a very faint pretty text image on
 
Designed by Jessie they are re-worked and collaged images printed onto A6 size post cards

Even the back of each card is special with a faded green color and typical postcard type text at the top of the card

Perfect for invites or just to send to your loved ones

The pack comes tied with rough brown string

Each card measures a6 in size 10.5 cm/14.8cm

name: Hand tied Kitchen & Cookery postcard pack
description:
A hand tied pack of x 6 postcards 

Each postcard comes with its own hand printed pale ivory envelope with a very faint pretty text image on

The images on these cards are taken from some of Jessie's hand draw illustrations of the home and kitchen

Even the back is special with a faded green color and typical postcard type text at the top of each card

Perfect for invites or just to send in the post

The pack comes tied with rough brown string

Each card measures a6 in size 10.5 cm/14.8cm

name: Collaged New Home Greeting card
description:
This card is made from hand cut images that have been hand printed on to various different papers.

They are hand printed by Jessie and then arranged on the front of this 5/5 inch ivory card.

This card comes tied with a hand printed matching ivory envelope, and is blank inside for your own message.

name: Pink dove greeting card with rag bow
Blue heart Greeting card with rag bow
Rose greeting card with vintage rag bow
Linen bundle
description:
I am always asked ware I get my linen from for making my brooches, bows and journal ties from...so here you go now you can also buy this little bundle straight from my studio there is 1 mtr in total half a mtr of dusty pink and half a mtr of natural.

All ties up with brown string for your ready to use in your own craft projects...once ironed the fabric works very well with my rubber stamps. Print the design on and cut out to make bunting, brooches or patches for your clothing, cushions or curtains at home.

Enjoy making some special little treats now....

name: Simple rag hair grips
description:
These simple little rag hair grips come on a lovely pink postcard each card contains x 7 hair grips

Hand tie by Jessie in her studio from vintage floral,stripe and check all off cuts from her Mums dress making or scraps from other crafting projects...

These little rag treasures really do look great in hair ups or just to pull across a fringe and jazz up any outfit and are perfect for any age

Please note the metal grips are my favorite as they are large and very strong.

Enjoy the raggy country side look with these sweet treats in your mop..

name: Pack of four lovely rubber stamps by Jessie Chorley
description:
This pack contains 4 rubber stamps beautifully mounted on these simple little wooden blocks for ease of use

Designed by myself Jessie I have chosen some of my most popular illustrations and most versatile the shoe the clock face the house and the lovely bow... These images can be printed on papers or on fabrics.

 I use them myself in my studio and at workshops for card making,scarp bookings and also on fabric for creating my brooches...they are also great for making wrapping paper...really the the possibilities are endless..you just need a good ink pad I am providing a little sample pad to get you started with each pack bought online 

Enjoy printing to your hearts content and I just ask one thing that these stamps are designed by me and I therefore ask you to respect this and that you only use them for items made for yourself or as gifts the images are not to be reproduced or put on anything that will be sold for profit or reproduced electronically even for advertising without my permission...thanks for your understanding and co operation.

name: J&B The shop Book
description:
Our first little shop book which contains 8 pages of beautiful images from our shop and also of our work.

Each book is hand bound in recycled card with a rag tie to the spine  and hand printed on the front with our shop stamp.

The first 500 books are signed limited edition and this information is hand written by us on the back of each book.

Inside the book there is  a hand printed envelope containing 3 postcards of our work and also of our shop for you to put up at home or send to friends.

The book measures A5 in size (210-148mm)

name: A Book about Jessie Chorley
description:
This little book contains 20 pages of lovely full color images of Jessie's embroidery work

There are two hand printed envelopes within the book one with free postcards and the other with little snippets of fabric

These little fabric scarps are snippets from Jessie's studio and she has placed them in this book for you to use in your own craft projects or when mending clothes at home

At the back of the book there is a brief description of Jessie's work and how she works

The book is stitched at the spine with rough brown string

This book measures a5 size 210/85mm

name: Little Cookery book
description:
Hand tied little cookery book
 A little book of kitchen related illustrations and recipes drawn by  Jessie and her Mum Primmy Chorley. 

"The recipes are favorites from our own family kitchen scrap books....There are also some illustrations of our own and our families kitchen ware"

Inside each book is a hand printed envelope with 3 free postcards (these postcards are assorted ones from the cookery and kitchen postcard pack series) these postcards can be put on your own wall at home or sent through the post.

This little book is the perfect gift for any cookery enthusiast or anybody who loves food and there home!

The book is stitched at the spine with rough brown string

This book measures a5 size 210/85mm

description:
Your choice of word/name/number fused enamel on a copper heart. The back of the heart has a lovely daisy chain drawing in enamel.

This present is an ideal gift if you want a present for the person who has everything! It also shows them that you have gone the extra mile to make the occasion an extra special one.

The choice of chain is
45cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver
65cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver
85cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver

The heart measures
3.5cm high 2.5cm wide

name: 'Werth y Byd' Heart Enamel Necklace
description:
'Werth y Byd' is a welsh saying which directly translates to
'Worth the world'.

The enamel heart is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

name: 'Ffydd, Gobaith, Cariad' heart necklace
description:
'Ffydd, gobaith, cariad' is a welsh, which directly translates to 
'Faith, hope and love'.

The enamel heart is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

name: Do all things with Love Necklace
description:
The large enamel heart reads "Do all things with love"
The enamel heart measures 3cm approx. the widest area and is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

This is a perfect gift for that special person on anniversary, wedding or birthdays.

name: 'Na choll ddoe' antique charm necklace
description:
Hand- made enamel plaque which has been scribed with the words

"Na choll dy henffordd er dy ffordd newydd"

which roughly translates

" Don't loose you good old ways on your new road/path"

The necklace is attached to a one-off antique charm, a broken antique piece which had no life has been given a new one. 

The chain on this necklace is Sterling silver and i slightly longer than the chains i usually use- 55cm in length, but if you would like the necklace shorter, there is an option below. The necklace has a small brass etched heart with buddug.com.
'

name: 'Cymru am byth' necklace
description:
A hand-made enamel plaque measuring approximately 4cm x 2.5cm with the words 'Cymru am byth' scribed into the enamel.

'Cymru am byth translates as 'Wales forever'

In the picture the necklace hangs on a antique gold chain but can be made attached to a silver chain.

name: "Don't be afraid of the unknown" quote necklace
description:
Hand- made enamel plaque which has been scribed with the words,

"Don't be afraid of the unknown"

The necklace is attached to a one-off antique charm, a broken antique piece which had no life has been given a new one.

The chain on this necklace is Sterling silver and i slightly longer than the chains i usually use- 55cm in length, but if you would like the necklace shorter, there is an option below. The necklace has a small brass etched heart with buddug.com.

name: Butterfly quote necklace
description:
This enamel circle has ben scribed with the quote,

"Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over it became a butterfly"

The circle has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

name: Enamel disk earrings
description:
2 hand cut disks with  double sided enamel with a little daisy on each side.

The disks hang from a choice of sterling silver hooks, short or long. These are quite special hooks because they have a safety catch so they don't pop out.

Due to the nature of the piece each pair of earrings are totally unique.

name: Little hand necklace
description:
A small hand sawed little white enamel hand and arm.

Inspired by metal votives which are a catholic tradition in Mexican and Europe. Different shapes, legs, arms aimed at different prayers pleas for help.

The mix of shapes are quite eclectic, i'll be making a range of the shapes so do look out for them.

name: Black Bird Necklace
description: A sweet hand-cut black bird enamel necklace, attached to a choice of chain types and lengths...

name: Black Swallow Necklace
description: A sweet hand-cut black swallow bird enamel necklace, attached to a choice of chain types and lengths...

name: White Sketched Teapot Necklace
description: Delightful hand-cut white and navy enamel teapcup necklace with hand drawn floral decoration, attached to a choice of chain types and lengths..

name: White Sketched Enamel Teacup Necklace
description: Delightful hand-cut white and navy enamel teapcup necklace with hand drawn floral decoration, attached to a choice of chain types and lengths..

name: Lily of the valley drawing
description:
A round copper disk with layers of enamel with a small individually sketched lily of the valley flower, drawn into the enamel. The disk measures 3cm approx in diameter.

the disk delicately sits on a fine sterling silver chain, measuring 45cm (can also be bought on antique chain) with a tiny 'buddug' heart tag on the clasp.

This is part of buddug's personal 'Save the wild flowers campaign' and due to them being hand made all are slightly different.

name: Hand printed gift tags x 15
description:
These little tags are printed here at our studio with a rich blue ink

Printed on to white tea stained paper tags with little stings to attach to your gifts or to hang in your home

These tags are perfect for gift wrapping making your presents very special indeed.....or they can also be used in craft projects such as scrap booking and card making or as decoration around your home

Pack contains x 15 tags in two different sizes

size1 5cm/3cm

Size2 3cm/2cm

The tags come packed in a little cellophane bag tied with rough string

name: Button and lace wedding card
description:
This is one of our best selling wedding cards at the shop and is now available online

Made from a paper machet hand cut heart and decorated with a border of vintage miss matched buttons finished off with a large vintage lace bow

The heart is placed on a ivory card blank and comes with a hand printed envelope 

This cards measures DL Size (95/135mm)

It is perfect for that special wedding or can also be ordered for a birthday, Christening or anniversary

name: little Thing magazine - Issue 17
description:
Little Thing is a lovely Chinese magazine, which has amazing photographs of really nice crafty things. We feature a lot in it, so we love it a lot! this issue is particular good!

Each issue is dedicated to a certain subject and Issue 17 is dedicated to all things berries/strawberry. There is a lot of lovely pictures like the cover picture, street style and how to make pages.

The magazine is printed in Cantonese, so you can't read the interviews (only if you can read cantonese of course), but the images speak for themselves!

We are the only UK shop retailing the magazine, so grab you copy today.

name: Little Thing magazine - Issue 8
description:
Little Thing is a lovely Chinese magazine, which has amazing photographs of really nice crafty things. We feature a lot in it, so we love it a lot!

Each issue is dedicated to a certain subject and Issue 8 is dedicated to a mixture of things. There is a lot of bird cages and vintage things.

The magazine is printed in Cantonese, so you can't read the interviews (only if you can read cantonese of course), but the images speak for themselves!lovely inspiration!

We are the only UK shop retailing the magazine, so grab you copy today.

in this magazine it features a collage maker 'peter clark' and the lovely emily chambers...

The magazine is printed in Cantonese, so you can't read the interviews (only if you can read cantonese of course), but the images speak for themselves!

Bathodyn gyda'r geiriau enwog gan Roald Dahl wedi ei ysgrifennu gyda pen ag inc sy'n darllen

name: "Love conquers all" badge card
Dream Come true
'Ffydd, Gobaith, Cariad'
'Pleidiol wyf i'w gwald' badge card
'Teg edrych tuag adref' badge card
'Welsh Lady' badge cards
description:
To celebrate how welsh ladies used to look, i've made little badges with old postcard pictures of them.

They traditionally wore large black felted hats, a woollen shawl and always an apron!

The badges measure roughly 3cm in diameter and has a strong metal back to each one, the badge comes with a recycled paper card, with a welsh message, hand written in pen & ink!

Perfect present to greet a welsh family member or friend...

you can choose from the options below, they link with the picture numbers on the left. I can also customised a card so it reads what you would like, just click the last option - customised message card and email 
buddugwyn@hotmail.com
with the message!

name: 'Happy Birthday' Badge card
Flower Garland Quote Cards
description:
Colourful hand cut flowers printed on recycled card with Buddug's hand written greeting in the centre.

The card comes with a little brown recycled envelope tied together with parcel string.

All cards are blank inside.

Choose from many different 
1- Happy, happy, happy
2-Mi gerddaf gyda thi beth bynnag ddaw
 (i will walk with you whatever may come in welsh)
3- Penblwydd Hapus
(Happy Birthday in welsh
4-Dream Come true

name: Colourful Heart Collage Cards
description:

 1- Happy Birthday
2- Congratulations

name: Henri Matisse quote doillie frame
description:
Enamel quote reads Henri Matisse's quote, 

“There are always flowers for those who want to see them.”

mounted on a one-off antique doillie, red mount and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 11 inches x 11 inches.

name: Dolly Parton 'Rainbow' quote doillie Frame
description:
Enamel quote from Dolly Parton reading ''If you want the rainbow you gotta put up with the rain", mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

The frame measures 11 inches x 11 inches.

name: 'Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over' quote doillie frame
description:
Enamel quote reading "Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly", mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: 'I love you, not only for what you are' quote lace frame
description:
Enamel quote reading ''I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am with you", mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: Calon Lan quote doillie frame
description:
The enamel plaque reads,

"Calon lan yn llawn daioni,
Tecach yw na'r lili dlos:
Dim ond calon lan all ganu,
Canu'r dydd a chanu'r nos"

Which translates to roughly to....
"A pure heart full of goodness
Is fairer than the pretty lily,
None but a pure heart can sing,
Sing in the day and sing in the night.

Calon Lân is a Welsh hymn, the words of which were written in the 19th century by Daniel James. The hymn is often associated with Welsh rugby union, being sung before almost every Test match involving the Welsh national team.

The round enamel pieces is mounted on a one off antique doillie against a grey shade mount and framed in a 10" x 10"  British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

name: 'We cannot adjust the wind' Dolly Parton lace frame
description:
Enamel quote from Dolly Parton reading ''We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails", mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: Anne Frank quote lace frame
description:
Enamel quote reads Anne Frank's famous quote, 

"Think of the beauty still left around you and be happy"

mounted on a one-off antique doillie, navy colour mount and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 11 inches x 11 inches.

name: Nant y Mynydd Lace Doillie Frame
description:
An antique lace doillie mounted on a cherry maroon coloured  mount board and framed in 10" x 10" wooden frame. The enamel plaque reads the welsh well-known poem, Nant y Mynydd.

"Nant y mynydd groyw loyw 
Yn ymdroelli tua'r pant 
Rhwng y brwyn yn sisial ganu 
O na bawn i fel y nant."

which translates to

"Mountain stream, clear and bright 
Meandering toward the valley 
Among the rushes softly singing 
O that I were like the stream!"

name: George Eliot quote lace frame
description:
Enamel quote reads George Eliot's quote,
 
“It's never too late to be what you might have been.”

mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: Roald Dahl quote doillie frame
description:
Enamel quote reads Roald Dahl's quote,
 
"Watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places"

mounted on a one-off antique doillie, dark green mount and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: Dolly Parton 'if you want the rainbow'....
description:
Enamel quote from Dolly Parton reading ''If you want the rainbow you gotta put up with the rain", mounted on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

The frame measures 10 inches x 10 inches.

name: Love Conquers All Lace Frame
description:
A short but sweet quote that reads ''Love conquers all", on a grey pearl blue mount, resting on a one-off antique doillie and framed in a British made, hand distressed, darker than usual wooden frame.

The frame measures 8 inches x 8 inches and has string on the back ready to hang on the wall...

name: 'Coco Chanel' Lace Frame
description:
Enamel quote reads Coco Chanel's famous quote,
 
“In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.”

mounted on a one-off antique doillie, pale green mount and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 11 inches x 11 inches.

name: 'If I had a flower' Lace Frame
description:
Enamel quote reads the quote,

"If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever"
A. L. Tennyson

mounted on a one-off antique doillie, dark green mount and framed in a British made, hand distressed wooden frame.

Due to the nature of the piece each frame is totally unique.

The frame measures 11 inches x 11 inches.

name: Framed Daisy Plate
description:
A small enamel dish measuring around 6cm in diameter with a daisy drawn through layers of the enamel. The little dish is mounted on a light sky blue mount board,and framed in a made to measure box frame in a lighter natural wood frame to what Buddug usually uses.

The whole frame measure approximately 20cm square.

name: Wedding/Anniversary Plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn description of the couples details, with a leaf design around the side to represent growth.

This plate measures 13cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging, so you can hang on a nail on the wall.

This is a customised piece which means it will take a week to make, so please make sure you order in advance if needed before a wedding or a special date.

can you please e-mail 
buddugwyn@hotmail.com

with the couples details.

name: Customised Birth Plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn description of the babies birth details, with a leaf design around the side to represent growth.

This plate measures 13cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging, so you can hang on a nail on the wall.

This is a customised piece which means it will take a week to make, so please make sure you order in advance if needed for a special event.

can you please e-mail
buddugwyn@hotmail.com

with the babies details.

name: 'All the flowers of all the tomorrows' enamel plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate measuring 18cm in diameter with a hand-drawn tree and a quote that reads "All the flowers of all the tomorrows are in the seeds of today"

The plate comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging, so you can hang on a nail on the wall.

name: 'Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over' quote enamel plate
description:
An enamel on copper plate made by Buddug, that measuring 14.5 cm in diameter reads the quote,

"Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly"

It comes with a hand made steel wire and spring plate hanger, so you can hang straight on the wall (it is easy to detach too if wanted).

name: Roald Dahl quote plate
description:
An enamel on copper plate made by Buddug, that measuring 20cm in diameter reads the quote by Roald Dahl that reads,

"Watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places"

It comes with a hand made steel wire and spring plate hanger, so you can hang straight on the wall (it is easy to detach too if wanted).

name: "mi gerddaf gyda a thi" Enamel Plate
description:
The plate reads,
"Mi gerddaf gyda thi dros lwybrau maith
A blodau can a breuddwyd ar ein taith
I'th lygaid syllaf a dal dy law
Mi gerddaf gyda thi beth bynnag ddaw".

which translates to,
"I will walk with you across distant paths
Flowers and dreams will bless our journey
Into your eyes I will gaze and holding your hand
I will walk with you whatever may come".

The plates has layers of enamel on copper and inscribed in-between layers. The plate measures approximately 20cm in diameter.

name: 'Nant y mynydd' Enamel Plate
description:
An enamel on copper plate measuring 20cm in diameter reads the poem, Nant y mynydd.

"Nant y mynydd groyw loyw
Yn ymdroelli tua'r pant
Rhwng y brwyn yn sisial ganu
O na bawn i fel y nant."

which translates to

"Mountain stream, clear and bright
Meandering toward the valley
Among the rushes softly singing
O that I were like the stream!"

name: Green Enamel Green Teacup Necklace
description: Delightful hand-cut green enamel teapcup necklace with floral decoration, attached to a choice of chain types and lengths...

description:

45cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver 
65cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver 
85cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver

name: Enamel Green Teapot Pin
description: A hand-made enamel green teapot pin with flower transfer, attached on a vintage feel brass kilt pin.

name: Large 'Love' Heart necklace
description:
'Love' heart necklace made with enamel and copper, hand-written with  bright red enamel on the back.

This present is an ideal gift for a loved one or just yourself! 

The choice of chain is 
45cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver 
65cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver 
85cm Gold Plated/ Antique Gold/ Sterling Silver

The heart measures 
3.5cm high 2.5cm wide

name: 'Cariad' Necklace
description:
'Cariad' means 'Love' in welsh.

So a perfect present for your welsh loved one!

The necklace comes in 2 heart sizes, small- which measures roughly 2cm in diameter and the large heart roughly 2.5cm in diameter.

The writing has been individually inscribed into the enamel which makes each hear slightly different.

name: Large Heart "I love you" quote necklace
description:
The large enamel heart reads the romantically quote "I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am with you"

The enamel heart measures 4cm approx. the widest area and is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

This is a perfect gift for a very special person....

name: Large enamel heart 'i will walk with you' quote necklace
description:
The large enamel heart reads "i will walk with you whatever may come"
which is a translation of the last line in the first verse of the famous welsh poem "mi gerddaf gyda thi"

The enamel heart measures 4cm approx. the widest area and is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

This is a perfect gift for that special person on anniversary, wedding or birthdays.

name: Large enamel heart 'To the world' quote necklace
description:
The large enamel heart reads "to the world you might be just one person, to one person you may be the world"

The enamel heart measures 4cm approx. the widest area and is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The heart has been decorate with a daisy chain design on the back and hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

This is a perfect gift for a special person in your world...

name: "live what you love' quote necklace
description:
A square enamel plaque which reads "Live what you love"

The plaque measures 3cm approx. in width and 1.5cm high and is made out of copper and layers of glass enamel.

The pendent hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

This is a perfect gift for someone who loves life!

name: 'Birds of a feather flock together' quote necklace
description:
A round enamel on copper charm measuring 3cm in diameter, with the quote "Birds of a feather flock together" hand-written into the enamel.

The disk delicately sits on a fine sterling silver chain, measuring 45cm (can also be bought on antique chain) with a tiny 'buddug' heart tag on the clasp.

name: knife and fork on an enamel plate necklace
description:
Hand forged brass knife and fork, delicately hanging with a copper, white and navy enamel plate, which has little leaves individually drawn into it.

On the back, i've left quite plain, just my name 'buddug'.

The plate hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

All necklaces are individually made so are slightly different, the plate roughly measures 4cm in diameter, all made in my little studio in Hackney, London.

name: Knife and fork on an enamel plate (with flowers) necklace
description:
Hand forged brass knife and fork, delicately hanging with a copper, white and navy enamel plate, which has daisy-chain drawn into it.

On the back, i've left quite plain, just my name 'buddug'.

The plate hangs on a choice of silver chain or antique gold chain.

All necklaces are individually made so are slightly different, the plate roughly measures 4cm in diameter, all made in my little studio in Hackney, London.

name: Poppy Enamel Plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn poppy.
 
It's inspired by the poppy symbol in art which represents the loyalty and faith between each other.

The plate measures 12cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging

name: Enamel Daisy Plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn daisy flower.

It's inspired by the daisy flower symbol in art, daisy which is the basic of flowers is a symbol of innocence.

The plate measures 12cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging

name: Enamel Snowdrop flower plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn Snowdrop. 'O lili wen fach...'

It's inspired by the Snowdrop flower symbol in art which has a meaning of hope. After all the cold weather and snow you'll see a snowdrop and you know the spring season is just around the corner

The plate measures 12cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging.

name: Forget-me-not Enamel Plate
description:
Black and White Enamel on copper round plate with a hand-drawn forget-me-not.

It's inspired by the forget-me-not symbol in art, the name represents a lot of the meaning, a symbol of a plea for remembrance.

The plate measures 12cm in diameter and comes with its own hand-made steel wall hanging.

name: Daisy drawing necklacace
description:
A round copper disk with layers of enamel with a small individually sketched daisy flower, drawn into the enamel. The disk measures 3cm approx in diameter.

the disk delicately sits on a fine sterling silver chain, measuring 45cm (can also be bought on antique chain) with a tiny 'buddug' heart tag on the clasp.

This is part of buddug's personal 'Save the wild flowers campaign' and due to them being hand made all are slightly different.

the disk delicately sits on a antique gold chain, measuring 45cm (can also be bought on sterling silver chain) with a tiny 'buddug' heart tag on the clasp.

This is part of buddug's personal 'Save the wild flowers campaign' and due to them being hand made all are slightly different.

the disk delicately sits on a fine sterling silver chain, measuring 45cm (can also be bought on antique chain) with a tiny 'buddug' heart tag on the clasp.

description:
Hand drawn cup and saucer design,inspired by the cups and saucers Buddug was given while having tea with her great grandmother when she was a child, riso printed on 100% brown card.

All cards are blank inside.

The card comes with a 100% brown or grey recycled envelope all tied together by parcel string.

3 designs to choose from

2-daisy pattern
3-polka dot pattern

name: Lace Letter-set
description:
10 sheets of lace frame drawings, inspired by old doilies, riso printed on 100% snow white recycle paper. 

The pack contains 8 (brown or grey) envelopes which are also made from 100 % recycled paper.

Perfect to write your summer time adventures to your friends, perfect also to frame your own poems or recipes.

Any way this is a perfect present to a much loved friend! 
(unfortunately dried flower not included)

different designs to choose,

1 - flower lace
2 - beaded lace
3 - linear lace

Perfect to write your favourite recipes to a friend, or write about your visits to exiting restaurants around the world or maybe you're a cafe or restaurant manager and want to write the menu in a new and exiting way.

Any way this is a perfect present to a much loved friend!

description:
Printed on 100% recycled paper this paper is perfect to wrap gifts or to use around the home,or on craft projects

Paper size A1 (177mm/155mm

name: Illustrated gift wrap paper
description:
Inspired by many things and many collections but one in particular a small diary belonging to a Mr Mouritzer found at a local st Market.
Perfect to wrap gifts in or to use in craft projects

Printed on 100% recycled paper 
Paper size A1 (177mm/155mm)

description:

printed on 100% recycled paper and comes in large A1  (700mm/500mm) sheets.

x 2 sheets of Kitchen themed gift wrap
x2 sheets of Hand illustrated gift wrap
x2 sheets of Once upon a time gift wrap

 Folded and come tied with rough string

name: Hand printed Tags...
description:
These tags are hand printed here at the studio on to rough brown luggage tags measuring 10cm/6cm.
Each tag comes with a rag bow tied to the top

Four different designs in a  pack x 2 of each design

Perfect for hanging in your home or for tying on that hand wrapped gift, Jar of Jam or Home baked cake as you give to a friend....

name: Hand cut paper machet heart card
description:
A hand cut heart covered in paper machet from old book pages.
Comes with a rag bow to the top and a tie of silk thread to the fold of the card.

The heart is mounted on an ivory card with a hand printed envelope


Card size is D7 the same width but slightly longer than an a6 postcard
Please note each card is hand made in the studio using recycled materials thus meaning colors will vary and the rag tie is made using scraps of floral fabrics so this means each card will be completely unique. The Bow on the card will be matched to your chosen text ie Blue for a Boy/Pink for a Girl.

Choose your preferred text below

name: Happy birthday card
description: A hand tied printed birthday card by Jessie Chorley for Roger La Borde.

name: Happy birthday lace card
description:
Printed lace doillie card, with a hand written, pen and ink 'happy birthday' greeting.

The card is A5 size and printed on recycled paper.

name: 'Heno, heno, hen blant bach' tape
description:
'Heno, heno, hen blant bach' translates as 'tonight, tonight, little old children'. It's from a famous Welsh lullaby...

It's written in Buddug's hand writing in black and printed on a inch wide white tape. It measures 66 meters long.

name: Illustrated Clear tape
description:
This rather charming clear tape is perfect for gift wrapping looks great with brown papers or white tissue papers.

It is also of course perfect for sealing envelopes and great in craft projects and scrap booking.

The illustration are drawn by Jessie and printed on this clear tape that measures 1inch thick by 66mtr in length.

name: Teaset Tape
description:
Small sketches of teapots and teacups printed in black on white.

The tape is an inch wide and is 66 meters long.

This is a perfect present for any tea lover!

name: Leaves Tape
description:
Hand drawn navy coloured leaves printed on white tape.

The tape measures an inch in width and 66 meters long.

Perfect for decorating a package!

name: J & B THE SHOP tape
description:
This is hand drawn shop logo printed in navy on an inch wide white tape....

the 66m long, so you'll never forget were we are!

name: Enamel Bell Necklace
description:
A simple but beautiful forged copper bell, enamelled in a choice of colours- Black, Green, White, French Navy, Turquoise or Daisy Sketch.

The 'Clapper' which makes a subtle sound inside is made in fine brass.

The bell hangs on a approx.85cm long choice of 
Sterling Silver/Antique Gold/Gold Plated chain
Soft cotton string
Black/French Navy/Racing Green/Brown 3mm leather thread.

The Bells measurements are:
Outer Bell approx.1.5cm length
Bell Bottom approx.1.25cm wide

name: 'Cariad' Enamel Love Spoon
description:
These spoons are inspired by the tradition in Wales of giving a loved one a 'love spoon'. They are usually made using only wood or metal but I have mixed the materials and added enamel and fabric.

This enamel love spoon is hand engraved with the word 'Cariad'

name: Enamel Lovespoon
description:
These spoons are inspired by the tradition in Wales of giving a loved one a 'love spoon'. They are usually made using only wood or metal but I have mixed the materials and added enamel and fabric.

This spoon is made with copper with layers of enamel and has 'Love' hand-written on it. It make each piece individual and special. A perfect present for a loved one or wedding present.

name: 'Love is the flower' Enamel Love Spoon
description:
These spoons are inspired by the tradition in Wales of giving a loved one a 'love spoon'. They are usually made using only wood or metal but I have mixed the materials and added enamel and fabric.

This enamel love spoon is hand engraved with the words 'Love is the flower you've got to let grow - John Lennon'

name: 'Mi gerddaf' Enamel Love Spoon
description:
These spoons are inspired by the tradition in Wales of giving a loved one a 'love spoon'. They are usually made using only wood or metal but I have mixed the materials and added enamel and fabric.

This enamel love spoon is hand engraved with the Welsh words 'Mi gerddaf gyda thi beth bynnag ddaw'
